WorkItem.Description:
Hello. I am totally new to asp so my question might be stupid. I created new controller so I can browse/update/delete orders in my store. If someone purchase two or more items, it takes two rows in database to store data. When I am going to 'details' view I can only display one of the purchased items. When im trying to use foreach loop I am getting this error: "foreach statement cannot operate on variables of type 'ss.Models.OrderDetail' because 'ss.Models.OrderDetail' does not contain a public definition for 'GetEnumerator'". Any advice how can I display all the purchased items?
 I tried to use List view instead of Details but I failed.
